channel.title: So how is this going?
channel.description:
Just curious, seeing as blake's account has since been deleted and no new posts have been made in quite a while.
In my opinion, given the state of the game now (i.e., players come here because they don't like new versions of the Runescape game... or they did until the so-called Old School Runescape grabbed at that market share), you should worry less about version-agnostic infrastructure. At the end of the day, how much does it really matter anyway?

item.title: So how is this going?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Yeah, it honestly looks like that any market for private servers is going to be either really early (317), or somewhere pre-EOC. And since Jagex has taken back the emulation community’s market share with their release of OSR, I agree that it’s not worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: So how is this going?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This board is meaning to be deleted eventually. My schedule has no wiggle room for any side projects, plus it’s not really worth it anymore.

Read full topic
